price: од Соломона и гласи: ‘У име Аллаха, Милостивог, Самилосног!
arabic: إِنَّهُۥ مِن سُلَيۡمَٰنَ وَإِنَّهُۥ بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: innahu min sulaymāna wa-innahu bis'mi al-lahi al-raḥmāni al-raḥīmi
